name: The Peak Addiction
summary:
Amazingly hard and addictive cliff climbing game. Hurry up! Water flood is coming. 
You know you'll never reach the peak but it's worth trying, no matter if you are President Trump, Star Kardashian or Drake. 
 
Collect gems, unlock charachters, track your progress, get all the medals! 
 
Features: 
*Funny characters (including President Trump, Star Kardashian and Drake) 
*Achievements 
*Two-finger control 
*Endless climbing fun 
 
Climb the hill like no one before, reach the peak!
